articles.title: With nothing to lose, loners build future in China's hollowed-out north
articles.description: But the 32-year-old ship mechanic became a minor internet sensation last month after posting a video of his everyday life in a largely forgotten coal city in the country's far north.
articles.content:
HEGANG, China (Reuters) - Li Hai is a nobody in China. 
But the 32-year-old ship mechanic became a minor internet sensation last month after posting a video of his everyday life in a largely forgotten coal city in the country’s far north.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Ford's vehicle sales in China tumble 26.1% in 2019
articles.description: Ford Motor Co said on Monday that its China vehicle sales in 2019 fell 26.1% from a year earlier to 567,854 units, as the U.S. automaker continues to battle a prolonged sales decline in its second-biggest market.
articles.content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - Ford Motor Co (F.N) said on Monday that its China vehicle sales in 2019 fell 26.1% from a year earlier to 567,854 units, as the U.S. automaker continues to battle a prolonged sales decline in its second-biggest market.
